name: Let's Sing 2014
overview: The party has just begun! Connect up to 4 microphones and sing with or compete with friends in multiple game modes: Solo, Duet, Mourning and Cooperative. Players can joke using voice effects in real time, such as automatic tuning, and play your best times to analyze how was your performance. Tracklist: Lady Gaga - The Edge of Glory Bruno Mars - Locked Out Of Heaven Olly Murs feat. Flo Rida - Troublemaker Carly Rae Jepsen - Call Me Maybe James Arthur - Impossible Lykke Li - I Follow Rivers Ke$ha - Die Young Maroon 5 - One More Night Usher ft Pitbull - DJ Got Us Fallin' In Love Imagine Dragons - Radioactive Tinie Tempah - Written In The Stars Martin Solveig feat. Natalia Kills - Mirrors La Roux - Bulletproof Jessie J - Domino James Morrison feat.
